name: OpenSea
all_locations: New York, NY, USA; San Francisco, CA, USA; Menlo Park, CA, USA
long_description: OpenSea is building the world’s most trusted and inclusive peer-to-peer NFT marketplace. OpenSea makes minting, purchasing and selling NFTs frictionless, and offers multi-chain options for creators and collectors of all kinds to own and shape their relationships directly. Headquartered in New York, the OpenSea leadership team comes from Google, Palantir, Lyft, Uber, Stanford and Berkeley. Investors include a16z, Paradigm, Coatue.
one_liner: OpenSea is the world’s leading peer-to-peer marketplace for NFTs
